think_procedure: The description of the knob 'vacuum_cost_limit' indicates that it is a numerical knob that controls the accumulated cost that will cause the vacuuming process to sleep. The default value is 200. There is no mention of any special values such as -1 or 0 that would cause this knob to perform a different function or disable a feature. Therefore, it can be concluded that this is not a 'special' knob.
